title: How to keep from catching VD
brief_description: A health officer addresses a class of secondary school students about gonorrhea and syphilis. Using charts, he explains the immediate and long-range effects of each disease. Stress is placed on the possible prevention of the diseases through selective sexual behaviour, cleanliness and the use of mechanical devices.
